description:
Upon arriving in space, Kazumi clashes with rival pilot Jung Freud! While the duo duke it out, Noriko makes the first in a series of unsettling discoveries.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Che audacia! La sfida della ragazza geniale!
The Challenge of the Fearless Girl Genius!
ไร้เทียมทาน! การประลองของสาวน้อยอัจฉริยะ
不敵! 天才少女の挑戦!!
